channel.title: Largest Folder you have on your desktop?
channel.description:
Pr0n folders are included.
Mine:
[URL=http://img137.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lelvh7.png][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/9297/lelvh7.png[/img][/URL]
^^ Thats the folder were everything i download gets chucked. ^.^

item.title: Largest Folder you have on your desktop?
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Nerice, post:104, topic:75849”]0, no folders, 5 shortcuts. I hate cluttered desktops, and usually delete away anything left so the others that use my pc have learned… want to really keep it? Keep it off the desktop.[/quote]nice…no one but me uses my comp tho…

Read full topic

item.title: Largest Folder you have on your desktop?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:109, topic:75849”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=111355.msg1157193#msg1157193 date=1176605190]

The best game of all time is the original doom and doom 2

Man i love you! but not in a gay way!
those games are FTW!!!
what about Duke Nukem 3D?
[/quote]

The original Doom was quality. I used to play it on the original Playstation. Scared the shit out of me though. I was only like 8 :P[/quote]

Lol i remember the days of doom n duke bakc with 95, then upgraded to 98 then SE, from then on my dad didn’t play at all, so i didn’t, untill i found the ORIGINAL cd installation disk of Duke nukem, i’m gonna play after lunch

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

item.title: Largest Folder you have on your desktop?
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:102, topic:75849”][quote author=ada link=topic=111355.msg1149882#msg1149882 date=1176504714]

Very small hard drive… and thats why im getting an external hard drive! yay for me!

50GB Disks are a bit of a joke now a days. But in 2001, the world record breaking hard disk was just 75GB!!! I have an 80GB hard drive (which isn’t much room really)
[/quote]

My mum has a 40gb one. My brother’s pc has a 80gb one with room for one more, and this laptop is 80gb, I need to try and buy a new one.[/quote]

To think my hard drive is 30GB and i can still fit all the keygens and torrents and virus’s in it >.>

Read full topic

item.description:

RXVL:

You guys obviously aren’t true gamers. Try Doom, Quake, Halo, Half Life, F.E.A.R. if I know moparisthebest like I do.

I got Quake 2, Quake 4 and Quake 4 special edition box sets.

I was like 8 when Quake 2 was really big so I can’t remember any other old school games like that.
